content.question: Which of the following CANNOT be determined from the information collected by the system?

choices.label: The total number of books borrowed in a given year
The total number of books that were never borrowed in a given year
The total number of books that were returned past their due date in a given year
The total number of people who borrowed at least one book in a given year

content.answer: The total number of books that were never borrowed in a given year

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
